overview: Ki-bong and Young-hwa are looking for a new house, and they rent a house for Tae-joon, who is pretty and cheap. Meanwhile, Tae-joon is angry with his wife for selling the house only for monthly rent without a deposit. After a while, when Ki-bong's business is difficult and the rent continues to be delayed, Tae-joon, the landlord, uses the delayed rent as an excuse to covet the body of the movie... .
title: Pretty new housewife
